Header: Vigeshwaran’s Tamil People’s Council to meet again today
Content: A Committee appointed by the Tamil People’s Council established by the Chief Minister of the Northern Province C V Vigneshwaran, to look in to political solutions is to convene in Jaffna this afternoon. Leader of TULF Gajendrakumar Ponnambalam stated that several matters of importance to the people will be discussed. However, the establishment of the Tamil People’s Council is seen as a result of the conflict of ideas between TNA Leader R Sambanthan and C V Vigneshwaran.
